thread.title: Mulvaney’s Real Target: Government, Not Deficits

author: Greg Ip
title: Mulvaney’s Real Target: Government, Not Deficits
text:
“I will always be a deficit hawk,” President Donald Trump’s budget director, Mick Mulvaney, declared Monday.
Come again?
Those words don’t mean what Mr. Mulvaney seems to think they mean. He is, after all, about to preside over a historic rise in the budget deficit due in great part to a tax cut he and Mr. Trump enthusiastically supported.
... RELATED VIDEO Spending Deal Means Trillion-Dollar Deficits WSJ's Gerald F. Seib explains why the budget deficit is set to top $1 trillion this year, thanks to tax cuts and increases in military and nonmilitary spending. Photo: Getty
